alert.note: Alert for Northeast Aroostook; Northwest Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 22 at 6:23AM EDT until March 24 at 4:00AM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THURSDAY TO 4 AM EDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 7 inches. The greater snow accumulations will be across the Saint John Valley. * WHERE...Northeast Aroostook and Northwest Aroostook Counties. * WHEN...From 6 AM Thursday to 4 AM EDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.
